Module com.pwr.dpp.backlog.dpp
Package com.pwr.dpp.backlog.dpp.business

Interface DatabaseHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
JsonDatabaseHandler
public interface DatabaseHandler
Provides connection with database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    createUser(String username)
    Creates new user with given username unless user with given username exists.
    void
    deleteTask(Task task)
    Removes given task from tasks List if task with the same id exists.

    Returns all loaded comments.

    Returns loaded tasks.
    List<String>
    getUsers()
    Returns stored users list.
    void
    load()
    Loads tasks, comments and users from memory if data files given in JsonDatabaseHandler constructor exist.
    boolean
    logAs(String username)
    Checks if user with given username exists.
    void
    save()
    Saves tasks, comments and users to location data files given in JsonDatabaseHandler constructor.
    void
    saveComment(Comment comment)
    Adds given Comment to comments List, if comment with the same id exists, it overwrites existing commment.
    void
    saveTask(Task task)
    Adds given Task to tasks List, if task with the same id exists, it overwrites existing task.
